Package org.apache.james.mailet.crypto.mailet

Cryptographic mail processing agents.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractSign Abstract mailet providing common SMIME signature services.
Sign Puts a server-side signature on a message.
SMIMECheckSignature Verifies the s/mime signature of a message.
SMIMEDecrypt This mailet decrypts a s/mime encrypted message.
SMIMESign Puts a server-side SMIME signature on a message.
 

Package org.apache.james.mailet.crypto.mailet Description

Cryptographic mail processing agents.
